page.title: Verify your email address
page.header: Check your inbox for a six digit verification code
page.description: Thank your for your interest in the CSC-CPP pilot, please confirm information below and enter the verification code to validate your email. If you can't access your email at the moment, press "I will do this later" and click the verification link from the email directly at at later time.

page.title: Email verification's code incorrect
page.header: The code you've entered is incorect
page.description: Try clicking the link sent to your email, if this still doesn't solve the issue, contact us at <0></0>
